page.title: 17**** HOME LIFE 2 ****
page.content:
a typical MENU for a 9 year old.(cont) LUNCH (12 noon) soup. potatoes ( chips, mashed ,baked) vegetables (one of: peas, carrots, baked beans, cauliflower) meat: (one of: sausage. pie or roast) sweet or fresh fruit. drink: tea, coffee, milk , milk shake, squash. fruit juice.
TEA> may be a main meal again with the family at home (DINNER) or a smaller meal consisting of sandwiches , cake and a drink. This meal is taken between 4.30 p.m. and 8.00 p.m. SUPPER a light meal, biscuit and drink,milk or squash. *squash is a fruit flavoured drink.....orange or black currant. Supper is taken just before going to bed.
